product_name: The North Face Isotherm Half-Zip Top - Women's
long_description: Prepare for your cross-country ski workouts in The North Face Isotherm women's half-zip top. It uses a warm blend of merino wool and FlashDry(TM) fibers and a zip to help regulate your temperature. Blend of merino wool, polyolefin and polyester fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and offers light insulation for the cold. Panels with wicking FlashDry fibers wrap around the sides, down the center back and under the arms for exceptional moisture management. Body-mapped construction provides lightweight warmth without sacrificing breathability. Athlete tested and competition proven, The North Face Isotherm half-zip top for women is part of the Flight Series(R) collection. Reflective logo.
short_description: Prepare for your cross-country ski workouts in The North Face Isotherm women's half-zip top. It uses a warm blend of merino wool and FlashDry(TM) fibers and a zip to help regulate your temperature.
